item.title: Models and DTOs in Your API
item.description: I religiously avoid using model objects on my API interfaces. The reason is really simple, a model is a business entity and you don’t want to expose a business entity inadvertently to your API consumers.

item.title: Put vs Patch Api in .Net Core
item.description: There are 2 http verbs that can be used when updating a resource: Put and Patch but when to use one over the another ? In simplistic terms the former updates the entire resource whereas the latter updates one partially.
